DE SILVA PALITHA – It is with deep sadness that we announce the passing away of PALITHA DE SILVA,​ Chairman of Tania and Tamara Holdings (Pvt) Ltd.,​ who departed peacefully on May 9th 2024. Husband to late Preethie,​ beloved father of Haren and Aprille,​ father-in-law of Damin and Ushani,​ grandfather to Jenaya and Jayron,​ brother of Kavantissa,​ Sanjeya,​ Avanthi,​ Tamara and Tanya. His remains lie at the Jayaratne Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves the Parlour on Saturday 4.30 p.m. for Cremation at the Borella Cemetery 5.00 p.m.
